feed.title: Amnezia Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Amnezia: 4.8.2.3
entry.content:
General

  • fixed freezing on the page with the list of users
  • fixed display of errors when importing configurations
  • fixed display of errors when installing servers and containers
  • fixed internal bugs

Windows

  • fixed tunnel service recovery error after backend failure
  • fixed check if amneziavpn-service is running (error 103 handling returned)
  • fixed "QFSFileEngine::open: No file name specified" error

Android

  • fixed display on screens with non-standard aspect ratio
  • fixed mouse click handling

For Ubuntu you need to install xcb plugin: apt install libxcb-cursor0 libxcb-xinerama0

entry.title: New release for Amnezia: 4.8.3.1
entry.content:
Version differences

Andoird

  • For Android version 8 and higher, you need to use .apk that start with - AmneziaVPN_4.8.3.1_android8+
  • For Android version 7, you need to use .apk that start with - AmneziaVPN_4.8.3.1_android_7

macOS

  • For macOS version 12 and higher, you need to use .dmg - AmneziaVPN_4.8.3.1_macos.dmg
  • For macOS versions 10.15 - 12, you need to use .dmg - AmneziaVPN_4.8.3.1_macos_old.dmg

Linux

For Ubuntu you need to install xcb plugin: apt install libxcb-cursor0 libxcb-xinerama0

Changelog

General

  • added user management for xray
  • added support for changing subnet ip for awg/wg
  • fixed closing of child processes
  • fixed internal bugs
  • increased the api request timeout

Windows

  • improved wg/awg stability

Android

  • added support for remote control for AndroidTV
  • fixed wg/awg connection status check

Linux

  • improved SteamOS support

Full Changelog: https://github.com/amnezia-vpn/amnezia-client/compare/4.8.2.3...4.8.3.1

entry.title: New release for Amnezia: 4.8.7.2
entry.content:
Version differences

Android

  • For Android version 8 and higher, you need to use .apk that start with - AmneziaVPN_4.8.7.2_android8+
  • For Android version 7, you need to use .apk that start with - AmneziaVPN_4.8.7.2_android_7

macOS

!!! For macOS Sequoia at the moment there is a problem with uninstalling the macOS app. The app can only be uninstalled/updated via “move to bin” in the applications folder

  • For macOS version 12 and higher, you need to use .dmg - AmneziaVPN_4.8.7.2_macos.dmg
  • For macOS versions 10.15 - 12, you need to use .dmg - AmneziaVPN_4.8.7.2_macos_old.dmg

Linux

For Ubuntu you need to install xcb plugin: apt install libxcb-cursor0 libxcb-xinerama0

Changelog

iOS

  • protocols based on OpenVPN do not work on this version

General

  • added a dns exceptions for killswitch
  • added the ability to change the xray port after installing

  • added an "export logs" button on the start page

  • fixed loading of parameters (subnet_address for awg/wg and site for xray) after check the server for installed amnezia services

  • fixed an issue with an empty site split tunneling list
  • fixed various internal bugs

Also we would like to thank Egor Filatov from Positive Technologies for discovering and reporting a vulnerability in AmneziaVPN. The researchers at Positive Technologies have also prepared a detailed technical report describing the identified issue. This vulnerability has been fixed in the current release.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/amnezia-vpn/amnezia-client/compare/4.8.5.0...4.8.7.2
